location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 6/40 List of Officials in the Bahrain Government drawing salaries of Rs. 50/- and over'

physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

The foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 12; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 3-10; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains two copies of a list of Bahrain government employees with monthly salaries of 50 rupees or more. The list is divided into governmental departments and shows the employee's name, salary, and nationality. Also contained in the file is correspondence from Charles Dalrymple Belgrave, Adviser to the Government of Bahrain, reporting changes in government personnel.Folio 11 is internal office notes.
